title: Calories in Dunkin Donuts Munchkins
meta_description: Discover calories in Dunkin Donuts Munchkins per serving, including carbs, sugars, fat, protein, and nutrition tweaks for different flavors.
assumptions: Average glazed variety; small serving of 4 pieces; based on standard Dunkin' recipes without fillings or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, batch, and location. Check Dunkin' app or packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A serving of 4 Dunkin Donuts Munchkins has about 240 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Dunkin Donuts Munchkin?
faqs.a: About 60 kcal per average glazed Munchkin.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Dunkin Donuts Munchkins?
faqs.a: 4 Munchkins have ~32 g carbs, including 14 g sugars.

faqs.q: Are Dunkin Munchkins high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 4 provide 12 g fat, with 6 g saturated.

faqs.q: Calories in a dozen Dunkin Donuts Munchkins?
faqs.a: Around 720 kcal for 12, based on 60 kcal each.

faqs.q: Do flavors affect calories in Dunkin Munchkins?
faqs.a: Yes, chocolate or filled varieties add 10-20 kcal per piece.
